Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Kafkan Way, north of the Shrine of Moradin.
Room.LongDescription: The Dwarven Shrine of Moradin lies on the south side of the road where numerous dwarves annually pilgrimage to. The Shrine is one of the largest in the city. On the north side of the road is the Oceancrest Technological Research Facility where various studies are going on to figure out why the earth moves, why there is day and night, and why do people still insist on killing themselves to gain proficiency.
